attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove the restriction to right to work by having to pay for transfer fees to the BIA/HO for those who have the right of abode by forcing them to pay fees for transfer of certificates to new passports and to remove the control being imposed on them by the BIA/HO

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
